Plot: An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.
Title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
Writer: Adam Sandler, Robert Smigel, Judd Apatow
Actors: Adam Sandler, John Turturro, Emmanuelle Chriqui, Nick Swardson
tomatoConsensus: You Don't Mess With the Zohan features intermittent laughs, and will please Sandler diehards, but after awhile the leaky premise wears thin.
